title: Drop It And Let's Talk
description:
Description :
        One night, Byeong-geon experiences sleep paralysis in his new house. He finds a ghost performing oral s** under his blanket but brushes it off, thinking it's just his exhaustion. The next day, the ghost appears again, this time holding a knife to his di**?! "I'll... cut it off..."He barely manages to soothe and placate the ghost to keep it away, but now his body starts reacting to the ghost's seductive expression...*TW: Sexual coercion and sexual assault content.
